welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villa Alemana, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vina del Mar Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vina del Mar Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
